AfghanFemaleTaekwondoAthletesTrainInSecr.name: Afghan female taekwondo athletes train in secret
AfghanFemaleTaekwondoAthletesTrainInSecr.summary: Afghan veteran taekwondo trainer Yasamin Azizi has been coaching in secret since the Taliban seized power in August.

Sheriff:Houston-AreaTaekwondoInstructors.name: Sheriff: Houston-area taekwondo instructors stop woman from sexual assault, subdue suspect
Sheriff:Houston-AreaTaekwondoInstructors.summary: A family of taekwondo instructors were able to save a woman from an attack in the Cypress area on Tuesday, according to Harris County Sheriff Ed Gonzalez. Gonzalez said instructors from the Yong-In Tae Kwon Do dojo sprung into action when they heard some commotion going on next door. Simon An, 20, told KHOU 11 News that he was grateful his family's martial arts skills could help. "You wouldn’t really expect it in an everyday situation, but when the time comes, it’s very valuable," Simon An said.

TaekwondoEmpowersYouthAmidstCrimeSurgeIn.name: Taekwondo Empowers Youth Amidst Crime Surge in San Antonio
TaekwondoEmpowersYouthAmidstCrimeSurgeIn.summary: Violent crime surged by nearly 50% in San Antonio's Denver Heights neighborhood over the past three years. Despite the challenges, Taekwondo has emerged as a glimmer of hope, with Colossal Taekwondo providing opportunities for local youth to excel in competitions like Nationals and Junior Olympics.
